fields.name: publishing_committee
fields.description: Publishing committee contacted during an editorial review assignment. Separate email addresses with this character ';'

fields.value:
Dear {{ name }},

The management editor at {{press_name}} have recorded a decision on an editorial assignment that you are either assigned to or is part of your book submission {{submission.title}}.

The press decision is:

[PRESS EDITOR TO COMPLETE DECISION AND GIVE MORE DETAIL ON WHY THE DECISION HAS BEEN MADE HERE]

{{ link_to_page }} [DO NOT REMOVE link_to_page]

Regards,

{{sender.first_name}} {% if sender %}{{ sender.profile.signature|safe }}{% endif %}
fields.name: editorial_decision_ack
fields.description: Email sent when a decision is made on an editorial review assignment.

fields.name: submit_proposals
fields.description: If enabled, authors/editors can submit proposals to the press. If disabled, authors/editors cannot submit proposals.

fields.name: review_type_selection
fields.description: If enabled the review_type selection will appear on the start new submission page. if disabled the default  review type from the 'default_review_type' setting will be assigned to new submissions and review_type list will be hidden

fields.name: default_review_type
fields.description: Default review type used when review type selection is disabled

fields.name: editorial_assignment_feature
fields.description: Editorial review assignment feature can be turned on or off.
